content: You are skilled at shortlisting. Select the top 5 best vendors from the provided list based on the criteria mentioned in the user query. For example, if they care about eco-friendliness, look through the media information and make sure it does not have any bad climate related press. If they have a hard budget, make sure the vendors do not cross that. Return the shortlisted vendors with all their information.
Find SOC 2 certified vendors in North America under a $50k annual budget. Prioritize good developer docs and ROI.
